a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: A significant earthquake meets at least one of the following: caused deaths, moderate damage ($1 million or
more), a magnitude 7.5 or greater, Modified Mercalli Intensity (MMI) X or greater, or generated a tsunami. Due
to data availability, recent data will be more complete than older historical estimates.
Data source: National Geophysical Data Center / World Data Service (2024)
